About this site

Terms of Use

  • The files are presented "as is" and do not represent a critical edition of her texts. The texts were digitized by hand by volunteers and were proofed, but not at a professional level.
  • Users who find errors in the texts are urged to send corrections to catholicworker.org@gmail.com.

Copyright

  • Content from The Catholic Worker paper is not copyrighted. However, citing the original source and The Catholic Worker Movement website at www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday is appreciated.
  • Documents from other publications are available under fair use provisions of copyright law.
